channel.title: Dementhium Pkp shop
channel.description:
Hello,
I wanted to make a Pk point shop with pk points, so I have added pk points. The pk points are working fine, but I don't know how to make a shop where you pay with pk points. I tried making the currency of the shop the pk points but that gives me the following error:
Compiling RS2Server... src\org\dementhium\model\player\ShopManager.java:20: error: cannot find symbol currency = player.getSettings().getPkPoints(); ^ symbol: variable player location: class ShopManager 1 error Complete Press any key to continue . . .
It can't be an import error because it imported Player.java and PlayerDefinition.java.
I've googled on the internet but couldn't find any solutions, or how it should be done. So how can I make a Pkp shop with points and not with items?
Thanks in advance

item.title: Dementhium Pkp shop
item.dc:creator: @Luuck Luuck
item.description:
@Luuck wrote:

Hello,

I wanted to make a Pk point shop with pk points, so I have added pk points.
The pk points are working fine, but I don’t know how to make a shop where you pay with pk points.
I tried making the currency of the shop the pk points but that gives me the following error:

Compiling RS2Server…
src\org\dementhium\model\player\ShopManager.java:20: error: cannot find symbol
currency = player.getSettings().getPkPoints();
^
symbol: variable player
location: class ShopManager
1 error
Complete
Press any key to continue . . .

It can’t be an import error because it imported Player.java and PlayerDefinition.java.

I’ve googled on the internet but couldn’t find any solutions, or how it should be done.
So how can I make a Pkp shop with points and not with items?

Thanks in advance
